archimate:Device.name: Rugged Barcode Scanner (Wireless) (RBS)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Facilities Division, Security, Receiving Dock, Laundry, Environmental Services • Asset tracking, maintenance scheduling, warehouse inventory management, harsh environments.
Specifications:
• Scanning Technology: Industrial-grade 2D imager • Connectivity Method: Wireless via Bluetooth or RF with extended range (30–100 ft) • Read Range: Long-range scanning capability (up to 24 inches or greater) • Scan Speed: 150–200 scans per second or continuous scanning capability • Durability Rating: IP65+ (water and dust-proof), withstands multiple drops from 6 ft+ • Battery Life: 16+ hours continuous scanning, hot-swappable battery packs • Supported Barcode Symbology's: All standard industrial barcodes (1D/2D), including damaged or partially obscured barcodes • Data Output Formats: USB-HID, serial, keyboard wedge, data emulation formats • Ergonomics: Durable ergonomic handle, trigger-based operation, suitable for gloved-hand usage • Protective Equipment: Ruggedized outer casing, industrial charging cradle, belt holster
